name: The Liars of Cobble
description:
Game Jam - BenBonk GM#1

Theme - Trust no one

This was my first game jam so I wanted to try something I've never done before, I've never done much storytelling so I figured an interactive story would be a great way to express and try it...I had so much fun making this

Thanks to:

BenBonk for hosting the game jam.

You all for playing.

My girlfriend for her support.

And my family for testing.
